alert.note: Alert for Adams (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 23 at 11:14AM CDT until further notice by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in St Louis MO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Illinois...Missouri... Mississippi River at Lock & Dam 21. Mississippi River at Quincy. Mississippi River at LaGrange. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at LaGrange. * WHEN...From Friday morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 17.5 feet, Front Street, providing access to elevated riverfront homes in south La Grange near the casino, begins flooding near this height. Also, the alley behind several homes and businesses along Main Street (Hwy B) begins flooding at this height. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 13.3 feet. - Bankfull stage is 16.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Friday morning and continue rising to 17.7 feet Saturday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7:00 am) Location Stg Stage Mon Tue Wed Thu Fri Mississippi River LaGrange 17.0 13.3 14.3 15.1 15.7 16.3 17.0 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
